function.name: wallet_register
function.description: Register a wallet. Register an Ethereum wallet address via EIP-191 signature. Free — no payment required.

signature.description: EIP-191 signature over the registration message

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp used in the signed message (must be within 5 min of now)

label.description: Optional human-readable label for this wallet

function.name: wallet_list
function.description: List registered wallets. Returns a paginated list of wallets registered by the caller's address. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

limit.description: Number of wallets to return (1–100, default 20)

after.description: Cursor from a previous response for pagination

function.name: wallet_get
function.description: Get wallet details. Returns full details for a single wallet, including balance, policy, and status. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: wallet_deactivate
function.description: Deactivate a wallet. Permanently deactivates the wallet. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: wallet_fund_request_create
function.description: Create a fund request. Request USDC funding for a wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

amount.description: Requested USDC amount as a decimal string (e.g. "10.00")

reason.description: Human-readable reason for the funding request

function.name: wallet_fund_request_list
function.description: List fund requests for a wallet. Returns a paginated list of all fund requests for the given wallet address. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

limit.description: Number of requests to return (1–100, default 20)

after.description: Cursor from a previous response for pagination

function.name: wallet_fund_request_approve
function.description: Approve a fund request. Approve a pending fund request. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: wallet_fund_request_deny
function.description: Deny a fund request. Deny a pending fund request. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

reason.description: Optional reason for denying the request

function.name: wallet_policy_get
function.description: Get spending policy. Returns the current spending policy for the wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: wallet_policy_update
function.description: Update spending policy. Update the spending policy for the wallet. Price: $0.005 via x402 (USDC on Base).

maxPerTx.description: Maximum USDC per transaction. Pass null to remove the limit.

maxPerDay.description: Maximum USDC per day. Pass null to remove the limit.

allowedPrimitives.description: Allowed primitive hostnames. Pass null to allow all.

function.name: wallet_pause
function.description: Pause a wallet. Pause all or a subset of operations for a wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: wallet_resume
function.description: Resume a paused wallet. Resume operations for a paused wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).
